cv: "Edmund Israel Stehr Decker St., Detroit, Michigan Phone: 123-345-7890 QProsacco@wlac.info Objective Looking for a position as a lead automotive service technician in a large automotive service center Summary of Qualification 9 years of experience as an automotive service technician in an exotic European automotive shop.
